definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: son (MI Ph. [[בן]]; so Sab. CIS:iv. No. 2, cf. [[בני]] DHM:Sem. Sprachforsch. 6; Ar. 0ibnun; As. bin(u), Lyon:Sargon 9, 1. 57; esp. in bin-bin, grandson COT:Gloss, cf. Dl infr.; Aram. [[בַּר]], bar, pl. [[בְּנִין]], bniyn; cf. Palm., esp. Vog:No. 21. 31. 36a al.; possibly orig. connected with [[בנה]] build, so Thes, cf. As. bânu, begetter (Dl:Pr 104 & cf. Ba:ZMG 1887, 638 ff.); but all traces of this √ lost in Heb. form; √ perh. orig. bilit. ([[בִּן]], [[בֵּן]]) …[[בַּן ]] v. Sta:§ 183)—abs. ´[[בּ]] Ge 4:25 +; [[בֵּֽן־]] Ez Eze 18:10; cstr. [[בֵּן]] Ge 49:22, Ge 49:22; [[בֶּן־]] Ge 5:32 +; [[בֶּן]] Es 2:5, Ne 6:18, & c. prefix Ge 17:17, Nu 8:25, 1Ch 27:23, 2Ch 25:5, 2Ch 31:16, 2Ch 31:17; [[בְּנוֹ]] Nu 23:18, Nu 24:3, Nu 24:15; [[בְּנִי]] Ge 49:11; [[בִּן]] De 25:2; [[בִּן־]] Ex 33:11 + 32 t. (29 t. in combination [[בִּן־נוּן]] ([[ישׁוע]], [[הושׁע]]) [[יהושׁע]]); sf. [[בְּנִי]] Ge 21:10 +; [[בִּנְךָ]] Ex 20:10 +; [[לִבֱנ֑ךָ]] De 7:3, 1Ki 11:13; [[בְּנֵךְ]] Ge 30:14 +; [[בְּנוֹ]] Ge 4:17 +; [[בְּנׇהּ]] Ge 21:10 +; pl. [[בָּנִים]] Ge 3:16 +; cstr. [[בְּנֵי]] Ge 6:2 +; sf. [[בָּנַי]] Ge 31:43 +; [[בָּנֵינוּ]] Jos 22:25 +; [[בְּנֵיכֶם]] Ex 3:22 +, etc.;—

son, male child, born of a woman Ge 4:25, Ge 16:11, Ge 16:15, Ge 17:19 cf. v:Ge 17:16, Ge 18:10, Ge 18:14, Ge 19:37, Ge 19:38 + oft., cf. [[בֶּן־בִּטְנׇהּ]] Is 49:15; begotten by a man Ge 5:4 f; Ge 5:28, Ge 6:10, Ge 11:11 f. + oft.; ‖[[בַּת]] ([[בָּנוֹת]]) daughter Ge 5:4, Ge 5:7, Ge 5:10 f., Ge 11:11, Ge 11:13, Ge 11:15 f., Ex 20:10, De 5:14, De 16:11, De 16:14, 1Sa 30:3, 1Sa 30:6, Job 1:2, Job 42:13 +; of son as desired Ge 30:2 (cf. Ge 15:2, Ge 16:2, Ge 17:17, Ge 18:10 f., 1Sa 1:5-11) 2Ki 4:14, 2Ki 4:28, Ps 127:3 +; rejoiced in Ge 30:6 +; beloved Ex 21:5, 2Sa 19:1, 2Sa 19:3, 2Sa 19:5, 1Ki 3:26; cared for De 1:31; spared Mal 3:17; disciplined & trained De 8:5, Pr 3:12, Pr 13:24, Pr 19:18, Pr 29:17; owing reverence, obedience, etc. to parents Pr 6:20, Pr 10:1, Pr 13:1; [[בִּנְךָ בְּכוֹרְךָ]] thy first-born son Ge 27:32; [[הַבֵּן הַבְּכׂר]] De 21:15 cf. 1Sa 8:2; [[בְּנׇהּ]] [[הַגׇּדׂל]] her elder son Ge 27:15, Ge 27:42; [[בְּנוֹ הַגׇּדׂל]] Ge 27:1; [[בְּנׇהּ]] [[הַקָּטָן]] her younger son Ge 27:15, Ge 27:42. In partic.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[בֶּן־אִמּוֹ]] son of his mother, i.e. own (uterine) brother Ge 43:29, cf. Ge 27:29, Ju Jdg 8:19, Ps 50:20, Ps 69:9, & v. [[אֵם]]; [[בְּנֵי אָבִיךָ]] sons of thy father = brethren Ge 49:8 (poet.) †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[בְּנֵי דׂדֵיהֶן]] = cousins Nu 36:11.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[בְּנִי]] my son, as term of kindliness or endearment, used by Eli to Samuel 1Sa 3:6, 1Sa 3:16 cf. 1Sa 4:16, 1Sa 24:17, 1Sa 26:17, 1Sa 26:21, 1Sa 26:25, v. also Pr 1:8, Pr 1:10, Pr 2:1 +; cf. [[בִּנְךָ]], used by Benhadad of himself to Elisha 2Ki 8:9; by Ahaz to Tiglath-pileser 2Ki 16:7; esp. to express intimate and gracious relation with God: ´[[י]] calls Israel [[בְּנִי בְכׂרִי]] Ex 4:22 cf. v:Ex 4:23, Ho 11:1, v. also Ps 80:16 (but cf. Che); [[בָּנִם אַתֶּם ליהוה אלהיכם]] De 14:1; [[בְּנֵי]] [[עֶלְיוֹן]] Ps 82:6 (‖[[אלהים]]); [[בְּנֵי אֵל־חָָי]] Ho 2:1; cf. further De 32:5 (pl.) v:De 32:20 (pl.) Is 1:2, Is 1:4, Is 30:1, Is 30:9, Je 3:14, Je 3:22, Je 4:22, Je 31:20; of future Davidic king 2Sa 7:14 = 1Ch 17:13 cf. Ps 2:7; expressly referred to Solomon 1Ch 22:10, 1Ch 28:6; also of children (offered in fire) Ez Eze 16:21.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[בְּנֵי האלהים]] applied to supernatural beings Ge 6:2, Ge 6:4, Job 1:6, Job 2:1; [[בְּנֵי אלהים]] Job 38:7; [[בְּנֵי אֵלִים]] Ps 29:1 (on which cf. Che's note) Ps 89:7.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[בֶּן־בִּנְךָ]] = thy grandson Ex 10:2, De 6:2, Ju Jdg 8:22 cf., Je 27:7; pl. Ex 34:7, De 4:9, De 4:25, Ju Jdg 12:14, 2Ki 17:41, 2Ch 8:40, Job 42:16, Ps 128:6, Pr 13:22, Pr 17:6, Ez Eze 37:25; also [[בֵּן]] alone with similar reference Ge 29:5 (Laban son of Nahor); Laban calls his daughters' children his own sons Ge 31:28, Ge 31:43 cf. Ge 32:1; so of Naomi Ru 4:17; [[בְּנֵי]] [[רְבִעִים]] 2Ki 10:30 sons of the fourth generation, and, in general, descendants Jos 22:24, Jos 22:25, Jos 22:27 +; v. also sub

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: infr.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: constantly, as more precise designation, added to personal name [[כָּלֵב בֶּן־יְפֻנֶּה]] Nu 14:30, Nu 32:12, Nu 34:19 +; [[יְהוֹשֻׁעַ בִּן־נוּן]] Nu 11:28, Nu 14:30, Nu 32:12, Nu 32:28, Nu 34:17 +; [[יׇרָבְעָם בֶּן־נְבָט]] 1Ki 12:2, 1Ki 12:15 +, etc.; also without personal name (often with implication of contempt) [[בֶּן־קִישׁ]] 1Sa 10:11; [[בֶּן־יִשַׁי]] 1Sa 20:27, 1Sa 20:30, 1Sa 20:31, 1Sa 22:7, 1Sa 22:8, 1Sa 22:9, 1Sa 22:13, 1Sa 25:10, 2Sa 20:1; [[בְּנֵי חְרוּיׇה]] 2Sa 16:10; [[בֶּן־רְמַלְיׇהוּ]] Is 7:4, Is 7:5, Is 7:9, Is 8:16; [[בֶּן־טָֽבְאַָל]] Is 7:6; cf. also [[בְּנֵי לֵוִי]] Nu 16:7, Nu 16:8.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: designated as [[בֶּן־זְקֻנִים]] i.e. born in old age of father Ge 37:3; opp. [[בְּנֵי הַנְּעוּרִים]] sons of one's youth Ps 127:4; also [[בֶּן־בֵּיתִי]] one born in my house Ge 15:3 (i.e. slave) so [[בְּנֵי בַיִת]] Ec 2:7.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: in various combinations: (a) as expression of contumely, [[בֶּן־]] [[נַעֲוַת הַמַּרְדּוּת]] 1Sa 20:30; [[בֶּן־הַמְּרַצֵּחַ הַזֶּה]] 2Ki 6:32 this son of a murderer; cf. [[בְּנֵי־נׇבָל]] Job 30:8; [[בְּנֵי בְלִי־שֵׁם]] ib.; [[בְּנֵי עׂנֲַנׇה]] Is 57:3 (‖[[זֶרַע מְנׇאֵף]]); cf. [[בֶּן־אִשָּׁה אַחֶרֶת]] Ju Jdg 11:2 (cf. v:Jdg 11:1); (b) as term of respect, dignity, [[בֶּן־חוֹרִים]] son of nobles Ec 10:17 (in Aram. = free born); [[בֶּן־חֲכָמִים]] Is 19:11; [[בֶּן־מַלְכֵי־קֶדֶם]] ib.; cf. [[בֶּן־מֶלֶךְ]] Ps 72:1 (‖[[מֶלֶךְ]]); [[בֶּן־אֲמָתֶָךָ]] Ps 86:16 in addressing ´[[י]] (‖[[עַבְדֶָּךָ]]) & [[בְּנֵי־עֲבָדֶיךָ]] Ps 102:29; of noble appearance [[בְּנֵי הַמֶּלֶךְ]] Ju Jdg 8:18.

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: oft. pl. with name of ancestor, people, land, or city, to denote descendants, inhabitants, membership in a nation or family, etc.: (a) e.g. [[בְּנֵי־עֵבֶר]] Ge 10:21; [[בְּנֵי־חֵת]] Ge 23:3, Ge 23:5, Ge 23:7, Ge 23:10, Ge 23:10, Ge 23:11, Ge 23:16, Ge 23:18, Ge 23:20, Ge 25:10, Ge 49:32 (all P); ([[בְּנֵי־שֵׁת]] Nu 24:17 v. sub

definitions.title: 7 b
definitions.body: infr.
of plant-shoots [[בֵּן פּׂרָת]] Ge 49:22, Ge 49:22; also [[בֵּן]] Ps 80:16 ? (‖[[כַּנׇּה]]; see Che trans. & crit. n.)

fig. of lifeless things, [[בְּנֵי רֶשֶׁם]] sparks Job 5:7; stars [[עַיִשׁ]] [[עַל־בָּנֶיהָ]] Job 38:32; arrows [[בֶּן־קָָשֶׁת]] Job 41:2; [[בְּנֵי]] [[אַשְׁפָּתוֹ]] La 3:13; cf. [[בֶּן־גׇּרְנִי]] i.e. corn of my threshing-floor Is 21:10.

definitions.title: 7. a.
definitions.body: member of a guild, order or class, † [[בְּנֵי הַנְּבִיאִים]] i.e. those belonging to the prophetic order 1Ki 20:35, 2Ki 2:3, 2Ki 2:5, 2Ki 2:7, 2Ki 2:15, 2Ki 4:1, 2Ki 4:38, 2Ki 4:38, 2Ki 5:22, 2Ki 6:1, 2Ki 9:1 (Hoffm RS:Proph, 85, 388, K 15 f.; Zehnpfxund:BAS i, 355 comp. As. mâr šipri (šiprâtum), son of a messenger = messenger, and explains from the son's succeeding to father's calling) & [[בֶּן־נׇבִיא]] Am 7:14; prob. also † [[בְּנֵי הַכּׂהֲנִים]] 1Ch 9:30, Ezr 2:61, Ezr 10:18; † [[בְּנֵי הַשּׁׂעֲרִים]] Ezr 2:42; cf. [[בְּנֵי הַגְּדוּד]] 2Ch 25:13 men of the troop, v. Palm. [[בנישירתא]] men of the caravan Vog:No, 4 al.; also [[בְּנֵי הַגּוֹלָה]] = exiles † Ezr 4:1, Ezr 6:19, Ezr 6:20, Ezr 8:35, Ezr 10:7, Ezr 10:16 (v. [[גולה]] sub [[גלה]]): further, in [[בֶּן־נֵכָר]] = foreigner (only P, poet., & late) † Ge 17:12, Ge 17:27, Ex 12:43, Le 22:25, Ez Eze 44:9, Eze 44:9; ´[[־הַנּ]]´[[ב]] † Is 56:3; [[בְּנֵיִ־נֵכָר]] † 2Sa 22:45, 2Sa 22:46 = Ps 18:45, Ps 18:46, Ne 9:2, Is 60:10, Is 61:5, Is 62:8, Ez Eze 44:7, Ps 144:7, Ps 144:11, ´[[בְּנֵי־הַנּ]] Is 56:6; also [[בְּנֵי הַתּוֹשָׁבִּים הַגׇּרִים עִמָּכֶם]] Le 25:4, Le 25:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of animals, [[בֶּן־בָּקָר]] son of (the) herd, i.e. young one of the herd, [[בָּקָר וּבְנֵי בָקָר]] 1Sa 14:32 cf. [[עֵגֶל בֶּן־בָּקָר]] Le 9:2 (P); then, in general, one of the herd: fit for food Ge 18:7, Ge 18:8 (J), for sacrifice Nu 15:8, Nu 15:9 (P); ´[[בן־הַב]] only Le 12:6 (P); esp. [[פַּר]] [[בֶּן־בָּקָר]] Ex 29:1, Le 4:3, Le 4:14, Le 16:3, Le 23:18, Nu 7:15 + 16 t. Nu (all P) + 2Ch 13:9, Ez Eze 43:19, Eze 43:23, Eze 43:25, Eze 45:18, Eze 46:6; [[פָּרִים]] [[בְּנֵי בָּקָר]] Nu 28:11, Nu 28:19, Nu 28:27, Nu 29:13, Nu 29:17 (P); also [[בְּנִי אֲתׂנוֹ]] Ge 49:11 (poem, J; ‖[[עִירׂה]]); [[בְּנֵי־חׂאן]] Ps 114:4, Ps 114:6; [[בֶּן־רְאֵמִים]] Ps 29:6; [[בְָּנֵי הָרַמָּכִים]] Es 8:10; [[יּוֹנׇה]]([[הַ]])[[בְּנֵי ]] Le 1:14 + 7 t. Lv + Nu 6:10 cf. [[בֶּן־יוֹנׇה]] Le 12:6 (all P); [[בְּנֵי־]] [[נׇ֑שֶׁר]] Pr 30:17; [[בְּנֵי עׂרֵב]] Ps 147:9.

´[[ב]] as n. relat. followed by word of quality, characteristic, etc. esp. † (a) [[חַיִל]]([[בני]])[[בֶּן־]] = mighty man 1Sa 14:52, 1Sa 18:17, 2Sa 2:7, 2Sa 13:28, 2Sa 17:10, 2Sa 17:10, 1Ki 1:52 + 7 t. Ch; ´[[אֲנׇשִׁים בני ח]] Ju Jdg 18:2, 2Ki 2:16; [[אֶלֶף אִישׁ מִבְּנֵי הֶחָָיִל]] Ju Jdg 21:10; † (b) [[בְּנֵי עַוְלָה]] wicked men 2Sa 3:34, 2Sa 7:10, 1Ch 17:9, Ho 10:9; ´[[בֶּן־ע]] Ps 89:23 (for [[בני בליעל]] v. [[בליעל]]); † (g) [[בְּנֵי מֶָרִי]] rebles Nu 17:25 (cf. [[בַּיִת]]); † (d) [[בְּנֵי הַתַּעֲרֻבוֹת]] sons of pledges = hostages 2Ki 14:14 = 2Ch 25:24; † (e) [[בְּנֵי מָוֶת]] i.e. those deserving of death 1Sa 26:16; so [[בֶּן־מות]] 2Sa 12:5; [[בְּנֵי תְמוּתָה]] appointed or exposed to death Ps 79:11, Ps 102:21; cf. † (z) [[בִּן הַכּוֹת]] one worthy of smiting De 25:2; † (h) [[בְּנֵי עָׂנִי]] Pr 31:5; † (q) [[בְּנֵי חֲלוֹף]] Pr 31:8; † (i) [[בְּנֵי שָׁאוֹן]] Je 48:45 = tumultuous ones; so also (= [[שֵׁאת]]) [[בְּנֵי שֵׁת]] Nu 24:17 cf. RV Di al.; † (k) [[כְּנֵי הַיִּחְהָר]] Zec 4:14 i.e. anointed ones; † (l) [[בֶּן־מֶשֶׁק]] Ge 15:2 son of possession, i.e. heir; † (m) [[הֵילֵל בֶּן־שָָׁחַר]] Is 14:12 son of dawn; † (n) of animals [[בְּנֵיִ שָָׁהַץ]] i.e. proud beasts Job 28:8, Job 41:26; (c) of Jonah's gourd [[בִּן־לַיְלָה]] Jon 4:10, Jon 4:10; † (o) of a fertile hill [[קֶרֶן בֶּן־שֶׁמֶן]] Is 5:1.
n. relat. of age:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of men, [[וַיְהִי נׁחַ בֶּן־הֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת שָׁנׇה]] Ge 5:32 cf. Ge 7:6 + 71 t. P; Ge 50:26, Jos 14:7. Jos 14:10, Jos 24:29 (all E); Nu 32:11 (J), De 31:2; also Ju Jdg 2:8, 1Sa 4:15, 2Sa 4:4, 2Sa 19:33, 2Sa 19:36, 1Ch 2:21, 1Ch 23:3, 1Ch 23:24, 1Ch 23:27, 1Ch 27:3, 2Ch 24:15, 2Ch 25:5, 2Ch 31:16, 2Ch 31:17, Ezr 3:8, Is 65:20, Is 65:20, Je 52:1; + 41 t. S K Ch of kings of accession; note esp. (incl. in above) the phrase [[מִבֶּן עֶשְׂרִים שָׁנׇה]] [[וׇמָָעְלָה]] Ex 30:14, Ex 38:26, Nu 1:3 + 21 t. Nu 1–Nu 3 + Nu 26:2, Nu 26:4, Nu 32:11, 1Ch 23:24, 1Ch 23:27, 2Ch 25:5, Ezr 3:8; cf. Le 27:7, Nu 8:24, Nu 26:62, 1Ch 23:3 & without [[מעלה]] Nu 8:25, Nu 18:16; also [[מִבֶּן עשׂרים שׁנה וְעַד בֶּן־שִׁשִּׁים שָׁנׇה]] Le 27:3 cf. v:Le 27:5, v:Le 27:6; [[מִבֶּן שׁלשׁים שׁנה ומעלה ועד בן־חמשׁים שׁנה]] Nu 4:3, Nu 4:3 + 12 t. Nu 4; [[מבּן שׁלושׁ שׁנים וּלְמַ֫עְלָה]] 2Ch 31:16 cf. v:2Ch 31:17; & [[לְמִבֶּן עשׂרים שׁנה וּלְמָָטָּה]] 1Ch 27:23.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of animals, (Hex all P, incl. H) [[בֶּן־שָׁנׇה]] Ex 12:5, Ex 29:38, Le 9:3, Le 23:18, Le 23:19, Nu 7:17 + 28 t. Nu 7, Nu 28, Nu 29; also Mic 6:6; [[בֶּן־שְׁנׇתוֹ]] Le 12:6, Le 23:12, Nu 6:12, Nu 6:14 + 12 t. Nu 7; also Ez Eze 46:13.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: Note.—[[בן]] appears perh. abbrev. as [[בּ]] in a few cpd. n.pr.; v. [[בִּדְקַר]] (= [[בֶּן־דקר]]?), [[בִּלְשָׁן]], [[בִּמְהָל]], [[בַּעֲלִיס]], [[בַּעֲנׇה]], [[בִּרְשַׁע]], [[בִּשְׁלָם]] (so MV after Schol. Hamâsa:3 ed. Freytag; Rö:de libr, hist, interpr, Arab, 20, 21; but this is very uncertain, cf. O1:§ 227 b, p. 613).—On Lag.'s explan. of [[אבי]] in some n.pr. as for [[אבן]] = [[בן]] cf. Lag:BN 75 & v. [[אבינר]] p. 4, etc., but this is dub.
